Hart-Cellar has destroyed America's major cities, and is on the verge of destroying America generally. When you include illegal immigration, it's even worse: there are probably 100 million foreigners within our borders

Those numbers aren’t accurate. The Hart-Cellar act changed immigration but it didn't destroy cities, and there are no where near 100 million undocumented immigrants in America.  Actually, estimates in reccent years put it closer to 11-14 million.  Take a look here https://www.pewresearch.org/race-and-ethnicity/2025/08/21/u-s-unauthorized-immigrant-population-reached-a-record-14-million-in-2023/

Illegal migrants are receiving $3500 free cellphones and free housing meanwhile victims of hurricane Helene only got $750

Hey I did some digging and it turns out that illegal immigrants aren't getting those things especially not $3500.  That claim is reffering to a pilot program in NYC to make food distrubution easier for those in need.  It's only provides food and baby supplies for one month, plus the actual number is closer to $350.  I found this fact checking article that really explains it well https://www.politifact.com/factchecks/2024/oct/11/facebook-posts/no-migrants-dont-receive-3500-debit-cards/

A: Everyone, list your favorite qoutes of all time!
(pass)
Hillary Clinton supports unlimited abortion on demand up until the moment of birth, including partial-birth abortion, with taxpayer funding.

That's a bit misleading.  Clinton clearly supports a womans right to choose an abortion and she's called for ending congressional restrictions on Medicaid funding of abortions. However she's said since 2000 that she'd support a legislated late-term limit on abortion if it included an exception to protect the health of the woman (which the law against partial-birth abortions does not). She hasn't pitched for unlimited abortion on demand.

C:  As someone pointed out earlier ISIS and radical islamic terrorism is a cancer on society. Got it ITherefore.  But Im still wondering: what effect do fringe white supremacists have on society?

I mean two things here. Firstly, it seems like your generalizing all muslims to be terrorist. If you are I think its pretty obvious that your wrong many muslim people live and work in America without harming anyone and they don't deserve the hatred that legitimate terrorist groups, such as ISIS, may deserve. Secondly, it should also be noted that 'fringe white supremacists groups' have committed many grievous crimes agaisnt honest American citizens. Indeed, these groups are likely better classified as terrorists.

A1 Shredding released a statement about them being at a Cobb County election processing center. The fact that the nobody has been arrested for shredding ballots is mind blowing. The Democrats stole the election right out in the open. The DOJ is a disgrace! Fire AG Barr!

The claim that ballots were being shredded in Cobb County was investigated.  It turns out there were documents shredded but they weren't ballots, just waste materials that routinely get shredded.  Here's some reporting on it https://apnews.com/article/fact-checking-9761550584

Remember when we were told for decades that the Maldives would soon be under water because of Climate Change? Guess what…  Nothings changed because the Climate Change Hoax is a Climate Change Scam.

I see where you're coming from.  Some predictions have turned out not to pass.  But the Maldives are facing real consequences like severe erosion, saltwater intrusion contaminating the freshwater, and damage to coral reefs due to climate change.  Wikipedia has a page on climate change in the Maldives that's no nonsense.  https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Climate_change_in_the_Maldives.

A: the economy is all going to s**t. Unemployment starting to rise, inflation going up, etc. Now Trump is going to find out how much people care about kitchen sink issues. It's like when Clinton said "it's the economy, stupid!" Or when Obama said "if we keep talking about the economy, we're going to lose."

Actually, Obama was misquoted there. The Romney TV ad quoted him as saying he'd lose if he kept talking about the economy, but Obama was actually *quoting somebody else's email*, not presenting that as his own idea. Out of context, anyone?
